Create a custom key holder with your name or initials etched into it, to showcase your dedication to your goals.
Use a keychain with a motivational quote or phrase, such as "Stay focused and dedicated to your goals" or "Consistent efforts lead to outstanding achievements".
Create a vision board with a picture of a key, symbolizing your commitment to achieving your goals.
Use a key as a reminder to stay on track with your goals, by placing it in a visible location, such as on your desk or in your wallet.
Create a custom key ring with different keys representing different goals or objectives, to keep track of your progress and stay motivated.
